hero.headline: Every Child Deserves to Read Their Dreams Into Reality
hero.subheadline: Join us in transforming young lives through the power of literacy. Together, we're building brighter futures, one story at a time.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content:
At Bright Futures Learning Center, we believe that literacy is the foundation of opportunity. We provide free, engaging reading programs to underserved children aged 4-14, helping them discover the joy of reading while building essential life skills.

Every book opened is a door to possibility. Every word learned is a step toward independence. Every story shared builds confidence that lasts a lifetime.

values.title: Inclusivity
values.description: Every child is welcome here, regardless of background, ability, or circumstance.

values.title: Joy in Learning
values.description: We make reading fun through games, activities, and celebrations of progress.

values.title: Community
values.description: We build strong connections between children, families, and volunteers.

values.title: Empowerment
values.description: We give children the tools they need to write their own success stories.

impact.title: See the Change We're Making
impact.subtitle: Real stories, real impact, real futures transformed
